product.title: Blooming Meadow Linen Ruby Roman Blind
product.description: The blooming meadow linen ruby roman blind is full of texture, colour, pattern and warmth, and makes a remarkable window dressing for many many schemes. Warm shades such as this work effortlessly with darker natural grains, whilst the linen mix fabric gives it a helping hand, the blooming meadow linen ruby roman blind is full of texture, colour, pattern and warmth, and makes a remarkable window dressing for many many schemes.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Cream Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm cream is a beautiful neutral colour, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder & great for injecting colour into any room. Their stockholm cream roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe.

relproducts.title: Valencia French Cream Roller Blind
relproducts.description: This valencia roller blind is light cream; think of an extremely milky coffee. Some might say buff or ecru, whatever you call it, it's a very nice neutral shade that adds just enough colour to the window. This colourway is beautiful in both modern settings and homes that favour this valencia roller blind is light cream; think of an extremely milky coffee.

relproducts.title: Rimini Dove - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The rich simplicity of the rimini in dove is all you need for any room. Neither dark nor light, it allows just a little light to penetrate, and provides you with the privacy you need, when you need it. And this resilient, quality blind will last you well, year upon year. There aren't many colours or styles that the moderating monochrome of the dove won't work with. Set off bright reds, complement deep purples, or tame dazzling limes.

relproducts.title: Rimini Almond - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The rimini almond is a classic, creamy white offering that's sure to add a touch of elegance to any room. Its fine texture makes it soft to the touch, yet it retains the durability typical of the rimini range. Combine with bold patterns for effortless period chic, or with browns, beiges, and golds for a modern, opulent look. The almond's luxurious finish will particularly suit a living room or bedroom where relaxing is the main goal, but of course would work well in any room amongst most colour schemes.

relproducts.title: Rimini Cream - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: By embracing the simple things in life rimini cream brings you a little touch of luxury right where you need it as you craft your interiors to reflect who you really are. A delicately woven fabric plays host to the rich and calming nature of cream as your mind drifts off to your own personal oasis. Cream works in any room where you want to add that gentle homely touch that brings the rest of your decor together.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Smoke Blue Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm smoke blue is a soft blue shade, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder - great for injecting colour into any room. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe.

relproducts.title: Meadow Storm Roman Blind
relproducts.description: Such intricate detailing in this clarissa hulse design. Meadow storm is inspired by the beautiful botanicals of the greek countryside, with wild allium, quaking grass and clematis picked out in an intense array of storm grey tones. Grey is obviously incredibly easy to pair with t such intricate detailing in this clarissa hulse design.

relproducts.title: Meadow Coral Roman Blind
relproducts.description: Add a burst of colour to your home with this beautiful botanical meadow design by clarissa hulse. The deconstructed bouquet features wild flowers and grasses found in the greek countryside, with the bright coral tones reflecting the colours of the setting sun. Printed on a gorgeo add a burst of colour to your home with this beautiful botanical meadow design by clarissa hulse.

relproducts.title: Summer Meadow Blossom Roman Blind
relproducts.description: This summer meadow blossom roman blind brings elegant style in the most delicate of ways. A quaint design in quaint colours. The milkshake pink shade might be the one that pops, but take a closer look and you'll find a touch of soft mint nestled amongst the greys too.

relproducts.title: Summer Meadow Magenta Roman Blind
relproducts.description: Magenta can be seen as quite a daring and brash colour, but on this summer meadow design, it works just wonderfully, especially with the hints of yellow alongside it too. The stony coloured neutral keeps the theme grounded, with the monochrome details making it a versatile bl magenta can be seen as quite a daring and brash colour, but on this summer meadow design, it works just wonderfully, especially with the hints of yellow alongside it too.

relproducts.title: Wild Meadow Pistachio - Roman Blind
relproducts.description: On a taming cream base sit the wild meadow pistachio's watercolour-style florals, in vintage blue, muddy mustard, and gentle green, forming an artistic and creative vibe. When curved into the tempered arches of the roman, the pattern takes on a new, more scattered vibe, providing the look with character and personality. Hang the pistachio in your home workspace or art studio, where the soft colours will both calm and inspire.

relproducts.title: Wild Meadow Magenta - Roman Blind
relproducts.description: Teaming bright fuschia with pretty indigo and sage green, the wild meadow magenta is true to its name, bringing to mind endless fields of wildflowers and grasses. The softness of the roman style only adds to this rural feel, and the fabric is backed with a fade-protective lining to make this blind last. The magenta will work beautifully as part of a traditional bedroom scheme in a country cottage or manor.

relproducts.title: Wild Meadow Ruby - Roman Blind
relproducts.description: On a stone cream canvas sit dainty wildflower illustrations in whites, mustards, and reds, in the country chic wild meadow ruby. The gentle, flowing feel of the fabric is matched by the drapes of the roman, producing a soft and sumptuous window covering, suitable for any home. Invoke a feeling of rustic rurality in your kitchen by using the ruby to complement sage green and cream surroundings. Accent with mustard yellows and pure whites, with the occasional pop of red, for a coherent and coordinated look.
